name: cordova-plugin-qrscanner
description: Fast, energy-efficient, highly-configurable QR code scanner.

scripts.clean-build: trash dist/plugin.min.js && trash dist/www.min.js && trash src/browser/worker.min.js
scripts.jshint: jshint src/browser/src && jshint src/common/src && jshint tests
scripts.gen-tests: npm run build && npm run clean-platform-tests && npm run mkdirp-platform-tests && npm run copy-platform-tests && npm run install-platform-tests
scripts.prep-release: git clean -dfx && npm install && npm run build && npm run changelog

validate-commit-msg.helpMessage:
This project uses commitizen to document changes. Please try:
npm install commitizen -g && git cz
